pages.text: Flowers have long stood out amoung the rest of nature, many credit their beauty, but that is simply a side effect of their latent capabilities. These specimens of nature are remarkable for their great ability to accumulate, distribute, focus, and direct the magical energy known as Dew.

Another material required for interfacing with flora is a purple gem known as the amethyst. Amethysts are located in dense geodes underground and grow slowly over time. Any serious application of magic will need a steady source of amethysts for their useful implements and potency.
